resources.string: Stream is offline right now or something wrong with your inernet connection.
Designed and developed by Microlion Technologies for Mahanama College Radio Club.

Listen to the live stream of FM Mahanama in anywhere with your Android device. With the featured functions and effective stream play service it\'s easy to listen with your device now. Customized for better audio play. Also automatically updates when there are any change in the stream server. More effective than the www.mcmu.lk/fm-mahanama web listener.
There is no ongoing match right now to display score. Please visit our Facebook page for more information.
TV Mahanama is now online and providing the live updates of the same match. Click below to watch.
No internet connection. Please check your connection settings.
FM Mahanama is now OnAir! Download the official Android app from Play Store or visit http://fm.mcmu.lk for our web version.
FM Mahanama is not currently onair! You can check our facebook page for more information.
Grab the live scores with FM Mahanama. Download FM Mahanama app for Android app or visit http://fm.mcrc,lk for web experience
